name: Sniper Fury: FPS Mission
description:
Download and play the best games of FPS Shooting and killing. Sniper Fury: FPS Mission is a free game that’s take you in sniper shooting arena and put you to fighting and extreme terror. Try to be deadly army assassins and shoot down them on your sniper bullet. Swat sniper Ops killing and shooting game lets you free for war against terrorists, enemies and deadly bad guys mafia

Features:
Sniping shooting simulation
Killing and sniper simulation
Extreme 3D graphics
Real-time firing physics
Competitive sniping missions
Realistic criminal’s characters
Thrilling sounds and effects
